Projects.title: Проекты
Projects.intro: Ниже представлены разработанные мною проекты, в основе которых адаптивный и интуитивный интерфейс

spotify.name: Spotify Clone
spotify.description: A robust Spotify clone with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase for user authentication, and Stripe for in-app purchases. Users can seamlessly register, search and add songs, and build personalized playlists, all within a responsive interface.
spotify.tools: NextJS, React, TailwindCSS, Typescript, Stripe, Supabase

blog.name: Blog
blog.description: A dynamic blog website with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Markdown, enabling users to filter posts by topic. The interactive interface provides an engaging and user-friendly experience for content consumption.
